      • isANum

        public static boolean isANum(java.lang.String s)
        Support function that checks to see if a given string is a valid integer. This is used to verify that individual fields of the ip address and port number are valid numbers.
        Parameters:
        s - - string representation of a number connect open.
        Returns:
        true/false
